short_summary: Medical diagnostic imaging and nuclear medicine products
description: Picture Archiving Communications System (PACS) for Medical Use
full_summary:
# Picture Archiving Communication System (PACS) Tender

## Government Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) invites bids for a Picture Archiving Communication System (PACS) to support Canada's response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

### Tender Details

| Contract Start Date | January 31, 2023 | Date de début du contrat prévue |
| Contract End Date | March 31, 2023 | Date de fin du contrat prévue |
| Tender Status | Expired | Statut de l'appel d'offres |
| Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN) | Not Required |  |
| UNSPSC | *42200000 | Produits d'imagerie diagnostique médicale et de médecine nucléaire | 
| Procurement Category | Goods | Categorie d'approvisionnement |

| Procurement Method | Competitive-Bidding | Méthode d'approvisionnement |
